events.title: Spring Planting Workshop
events.description: Join us for a hands-on workshop to learn about spring planting techniques and tips for a successful garden.

events.title: Community Garden Day
events.description: Celebrate Earth Day by helping us plant new trees and shrubs. All ages are welcome!

events.title: Organic Pest Control
events.description: Learn about organic methods to keep your garden pest-free without harmful chemicals.

events.title: Summer Harvest Festival
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled afternoon with fresh produce, live music, and activities for the whole family.
